mapper.select: select id from chat_msg where is_latest = 1 order by gmt_create desc limit 1,1

select cm.id, cm.user_id, cm.room_id, cm.content, cm.type, cm.is_latest, cm.send_time, u.user_name as userName, u.avatar as userAvatar from chat_msg cm inner join user u on u.id = cm.user_id where cm.room_id = #{roomId} order by cm.send_time desc
limit #{key_offset},#{pageSize}
